reviews.review: Играю 30 часов,уже могу сказать что геймплей и механика самой игры уже поднадоела,добавляйте новые режимы,способы для разнообразия игры сурвов и манов,а не добавляйте скины на персов и их оружия,реворкайте перки для персов,в особенности для сурвов
Игра норм, но с оптимизацией проблемы есть

This game has the most toxic community ever. It beats even league of legends. DO NOT buy this game if you want to have fun. Also at this point game is basically pay to win; you either grind for 500 hours to get killers and abilities you need, or buy it for cash, some iconic characters are even completely locked behind paywall. I know what you might be looking for: moody horror multiplayer game, maybe to have some fun with friends. But this game offers you only bugs, exploit abusers and lots of cheaters.

Топ игра. Только вот с режимом убийцы не всё так хорошо.  Поиск игры по 5-8минут.
Так что этот режим идеально подходит тем, кого распирает после запуска поиска  игры куда-то съе**ться (еда, нужда, заказ, магаз и прочая хрень). Иногда чудеса случаются и игру находит за минуту (3-го не дано :D), но чаще всего меня просто добивает ожидание и я перехожу в  режим 4-х бедолаг

Отзывы никто не читает, так что оставлю тут рецепт оладушек.

Ингредиенты:
Сахар 3 столовые ложки
Молоко 200 мл
Соль по вкусу
Пшеничная мука 200 г
Куриное яйцо 1 штука
Растительное масло 50 мл
Уксус 9%-ный ½ чайной ложки
Сода ½ чайной ложки
40 минут
Инструкция приготовления

1. Муку, сахар и щепотку соли смешайте.
2. Яйцо взбейте с молоком, добавьте гашеную уксусом соду. Добавьте муку. Замесите до однородной массы. Тесто должно получиться густым. По необходимости добавьте еще муки.
3. Порциями примерно со столовую ложку вылейте тесто на раскаленную сковороду. Обжарьте с обеих сторон на среднем огне

13/8/21    
今天特意拉着热心小伙伴，带着我这个小辣鸡一起玩了2个小时~~
全程虽然开麦了，但是我还是超级害怕紧张的，但是也好好笑，23333
然后遇到的路人队友也都很好，完全没有嫌弃我又笨又菜，还会不顾屠夫就在后面，还跑过来救我，就真的真的真的很感动！！！！谢谢有爱的队友们（泪目)
我一紧张还跑错方向，好几次转身跑到屠夫脸上。。嘛，屠夫也尬住了。。。（屠夫：就没见过这么蠢的）
第一次组了真人局，作为新人玩家，我全程还是有点纠结的。因为我自己平时是不太玩PVP游戏的，这种模式下的游戏，我会很怕拖累别人。。我自己虽然不停被刀被挂树，但是还是能找到自己的欢乐。可是我的路人队友可能是想上分，遇到我这种就会很难受了吧。。。。不知道有没有萌新组队的？这样可能大家谁也不会嫌弃谁，233333

Je joue à Dead By Daylight depuis 2018 et j'aime encore y jouer MAIS:
Aucune mise à jour mets en place un moyen d'empêcher les campeurs et tunnelers et ça en devient lassant, on est toujours obliger d'utiliser le même build pour contrer tout ça alors qu'un paquet de perks drôles à utiliser sont à disposition.
Je conseille le jeu mais si vous voulez vraiment vous y mettre je vous conseille de regarder le côté théorique pour loop en survivant avant la pratique! Bonne chance :)

Schlechtes Entwickler Design indem man als Überlebender zu starkes Handicap hat. Ohne Ende tunnelnde und Campende Killer sei es an den Haken oder der Luke es kann nicht sein das nix dagegen unternommen wird, dass macht das ganze Spiel, toxisch und kaputt ich verstehe nicht warum die Entwickler hier wohl pure Desinteresse zeigen wen wohl nichts unternommen wird gibt es entweder keine Spieler mehr oder nur noch Beleidigungen im Chat liebes DbD wie wäre es mal mit mehr Killer punishment?

If your playing Killer (especially at high ranks) it becomes a game of mind games and learning to constantly predict and out smart your targets.
However if you choose to play Survivor, it becomes a typical game of gen rushing or running around objects and pulling down a pallet to stun the killer who has to try 10X harder than you to win. T-Bagging him afterwards, because let's be honest you're probably a dick.

Both sides have toxic players, and it's important to remember that not everyone in this game is an asshole.
The game is currently very imbalanced as some killers have seriously strong mechanics (like one shots that don't really have a counter except to hope you make it to the window, or hope they go after someone else.)

Survivors will generally pick perks and abuse the terrain of the map to delay you until everyone escapes, regardless of what you do. Most maps in the game have infinite loops and don't really have any way for the killer to out play you. 
In short, if you play as Survivor, as long as you know where these locations are and don't make too many mistakes you will escape most matches because while your playing and having fun abusing the games design, the other Survivors should be gen rushing so you all get out in a few minutes.

I know this reveiw will get alot of hate from Survivors, simply because the game is heavily tilted in their favor and we don't really like to admit it because if people realised this, our content on YT would be seen as over hyped. Wich I'll be honest, it really is.

I played Survivor alot since I always enjoyed the idea of helping others escape, and at first this game was difficult, until I learned how to loop and locations that could be abused to waste the killers time. I eventually realised there wasn't really any skill involved in playing Survivor, especially if I was in a Survive With Friends group using an app like Discord for Audio communication.
I decided to play more Killer because the game was harder, I don't play the Killers like Hillbilly or Myres, because the one shot mechanic is too strong and takes half the fun and challenge out of the game. There are a few killers like The Hag who's mechanics are definetly over powered with the right addons. I chose to play Trapper, Legion, and most recently Ghostface. Those killers each have different play styles, none of wich grant a distinct advantage, but rather keep the game fun and allow for some very cool or hilarious moments.

In short, if you want the best starter/beginner experience, play Survivor. As until you learn the basics. (at wich point the game stops being scary, and instead turns into a meme festival.)
At wich point I highly suggest playing more Killer games since if you're looking get really good at this game Killer is very difficult at high ranks. The survivors at Rank 1 know how to abuse the game, and you will find that most games the odds are HEAVILY stacked against you.

I personally really enjoy the game, despite it's many bad balance issues. But I didn't want to lie to you, saying "the game is perfect, no issues or problems what so ever!"
3/5 stars, hopefully I'll see you in game. Good Luck, and Have Fun!
this game is a lot of fun if you dont take it too seriously

As you begin playing you probably want to be the killer until the survivors do 360's around you like in a fricking childs birthdayparty.... and then you think that that is the annoyingest thing in the game,... until the survivors do some crazy perk combo's and you know nothing about perks..... and then some random survivor always just run in front of you with a flashlight and blinds you as you are picking up your prey....... so if you are starting the game i suggest starting with friends or just watch a couple of vids or play survivor....

O conceito do jogo é consideravelmente bom,porem com o aumento de campers no jogo durante os anos tornou o jogo muito chato alem de nao haver penalidade para jogadores que desconectam durante a partida por acharem que estao em desvantagem contra determinado assasino e tambem nao existe balanceamento nos ranks dos sobreviventes e assasino que faz com que novos jogadores tenham uma experiencia ruim contra assasinos de alto ranking tornando extremamente injusto para os futuros players que virão!

Countless mouse/controller issues where your mouse will just go to the right on its own when you try to go on your second screen ( to go on google while you search for a lobby for exemple), sometimes your mouse will just keep moving on its own avoiding you from even closing the game and you will have to restart your computer. Even if for some people these are small issues it can easily becomes annoying after a while. Then, for the game community,...i think everybody knows how the community of this game is and Samination shows it pretty well with the "rules book" lol. If you play survivors you can have fun playing the game if you fall on good players but you can also fall on people who will just keep camping hooks or tunnel hooked people to finish the game as fast as possible and guarantee points...if you play killer then the ammount of fun you will get will depend of your luck, the players you fall on (their education, maturity,...) but also and especially on if you look at the chat. For someone to have a good experience on this game i would recommend to not look at chat because people will complain if they lose and sometimes even if they win. Playing NOED, playing endless tier 3 Myers,....all the excuses are good for people to come and complain in chat. And this issue will never go away. Not until they finally give us the ability to disable chat in our settings. Normally you play a game to have fun and to play the way you want to play but on this game people will annoy you until you play the way they want you to play.

БЛИНЫ ДЛЯ СИРОТЫ
состав:
2.5 ст сыроватки
3 яйца
1 ст. л сахара
2 ст мухи
соль, сода
приготовление:
1. Пол тоже стакан сыроватки немытого подорожника
2. яйца смешарика с сахаром и солью доброта дружбы теплую сыр плавленный и муху, Тшательно вымешкиваем
3. Добавтть 1\8 члена лобкового соды. Тесла розвести илона маска на биткоин сырота, оставить минут нахуй и мошонка жарить блять
